ingredients.ingredient: Â¾ cup Old Bay Seasoning TM
2 pounds hot smoked sausage links, cut into 2 inch pieces
12 ears corn - husked, cleaned and quartered

cookingTips: Add ingredients in order of cooking time: potatoes first, then sausage, corn, and finally shrimp at the end
The liquid is seasoning, so don't discard it; serve ingredients in shells and husks for full presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user master this classic Lowcountry one-pot meal by cooking seafood and vegetables together in seasoned broth.
